item.title: Bandit Algorithm Notes
item.description: This blog will update some learning notes when I study the book, Bandit Algorithms. Chapter 1

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme. Headings The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest. H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Paragraph Xerum, quo qui aut unt expliquam qui dolut labo.

item.title: About me
item.description: Profile Participating in laboratory C++ software program for 2 years. Skilled in designing preference learning, dueling bandits and multi-objective optimization algorithms. Adept at reading paper and duplicate experiments in the paper. Willing to accept challenging tasks, especially interdisciplinary investigation. Education 09/2018-06/2022 Southwest Jiaotong University, BEng Electronic and Information Engineering, Chengdu, China. 09/2021-01/2022 (Exchange) Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Electronic and Information Engineering, Hong Kong, China. 09/2022-present University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, MSc Computer Science, Chengdu, China.
